posts.title: Hot Lunch (1978)
posts.excerpt: Andrew’s life has hit rock bottom. After being fired from his job and discovering that his girlfriend is having an affair, he hits the streets looking for work only to discover a non-stop series of sexual delights waiting for him at every turn. Quote: When a country boy arrives in the Big City with nothing …

posts._title: Renato Castellani – Due soldi di speranza AKA Two Cents Worth of Hope (1952)
posts.title: Due soldi di speranza
posts.excerpt: Synopsis: The story concerns the romance between Carmela and Antonio. Faced with the hostility of their parents, they symbolically shed themselves of all responsibilities to others in a climactic act of stark-naked bravado.

posts.title: Family Life
posts.excerpt: A young woman, Janice, is living with her restrictive and conservative parents, who lead a dull working-class life, and consider their daughter to be “misbehaving” whenever she’s trying to find her own way in life. When she becomes pregnant, they force her into abortion, and hypocritically blame her for “upsetting them” when she is unable …

posts._title: Satyajit Ray – Charulata AKA The Lonely Wife (1964)
posts.title: Charulata
posts.excerpt: Quote: The opening shots of Satyajit Ray’s Charulata bypass melodrama for the feel of a fairy tale, with bored housewife Charu (Madhabi Mukherjee) flitting about her spacious Victorian home like Rapunzel amusing herself in her tower. Even shots that stay still for less than a second frame Charu behind bars, be it bedposts or the …

posts._title: Claire Denis – Les salauds AKA Bastards (2013)
posts.title: Les salauds
posts.excerpt: Quote: The world of Claire Denis’s Bastards is one of nightmarish inversion, where compassion has no place and connection only breeds despair. Structured around the fracturing of two family units, one irreparably shattered, one holding firm despite intense pressure, it imagines life as a steady succession of denials, duty waging a futile struggle against desire. …

posts._title: Stina Werenfels – Nachbeben AKA Going Private (2006)
posts.title: Nachbeben
posts.excerpt: Quote: Investment banker HP has allegedly ridden out the crash of the stock exchange. One evening, on a barbecue event with his banker friends and their wives, HP’s Danish au pair girl threatens to blow the whistle on her love affair with HP’s married boss. HP wants to please everybody but what was set out …

posts._title: Rainer Werner Fassbinder – Angst vor der Angst AKA Fear of Fear (1975)
posts.title: Angst vor der Angst
posts.excerpt: Margot, who lives in a comfortable middle class apartment, fears that she is losing her mind after having had her second child. Her husband Kurt, who is busy studying for an exam, does not understand her situation. Her mother-in-law and sister-in-law Lore are openly hostile to her. She resorts to valium and drink, and looks …

posts._title: Carl Theodor Dreyer – Præsidenten AKA The President (1919)
posts.title: Præsidenten
posts.excerpt: Quote: It perhaps comes as no surprise, given Carl Theodor Dreyer’s lifelong, idealized melancholy over his own unresolved parentage, that the scenario selected for his first film, The President would involve three generations of children conceived out of wedlock, and thematically crystallize on the legacy of their unreconciled paternity in the resolution of their own …

posts.title: Eggs
posts.excerpt: Quote: Two brothers in their seventies, Pa and Moe, have lived together all their lives in a little house in the country, the only interruption being when Pa made a weekend trip to Småland on his moped during the second World War. The past returns when his adult son dating from his Swedish visit, Konrad, …

posts._title: Nacer Khemir – Tawk al Hamama al Mafkoud AKA Le collier perdu de la colombe AKA The Dove’s Lost Necklace (1991)
posts.title: Tawk al Hamama al Mafkoud
posts.excerpt: Synopsis: The story revolves around Hassan, who is studying Arabic calligraphy from a grand master. Coming across a fragment of manuscript, Hassan goes in search of the missing pieces, believing that once he finds them, he will learn the secrets of love. With the help of Zin, a lovers’ go-between, he meets the beautiful Aziz, …
posts.titleEnglish: Le collier perdu de la colombe AKA The Dove’s Lost Necklace
